TEXT.TITLE: SEARS <S> TO REDEEM ADJUSTABLE RATE PREFERRED
TEXT.BODY: Sears, Roebuck and Co said it will redeem all its outstanding adjustable rate preferred shares, first series. The redemption price is 103.79 dlrs a share, which includes accrued and unpaid dividends from April 1, 1987, to the date of redemption of 79 cts a share. Of the 50 mln shares authorized, 2.5 mln were issued, the company said. It said no dividends will accrue on the shares after May 15, 1987. Reuter
